page.title: 10LONGFORGAN - SNR.CIT'S.CLUB.
page.content: The members of this club meet every Tuesday afternoon during the period September to May, and these social occasions always prove to be very interesting and enjoyable. The aim of the club is to extend friendship and help, as required. The membership fee is nominal (usually 50p per annum) but the funds are augmented by a small weekly charge for tea and a raffle, and by the generosity of local business people, and a sale of work. These gifts enable the club committee to organise, at no cost to the club members, a summer outing and a Christmas dinner. At the weekly meetings the members play cards and dominoes, have happy sing-songs, and occasionally a film show. Longforgan has many elderly residents, so this club is very well utilised and very popular.
